org.lwjgl.opengl

Class GLUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.lwjgl.opengl.GLUtil

  • public final class GLUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    OpenGL utilities.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void checkGLError()
      Checks the current context for OpenGL errors.
      static java.lang.String getErrorString(int errorCode)
      Translates an OpenGL error code to a String describing the error.
      static Closure setupDebugMessageCallback()
      Detects the best debug output functionality to use and creates a callback that prints information to the standard error stream.
      static Closure setupDebugMessageCallback(java.io.PrintStream stream)
      Detects the best debug output functionality to use and creates a callback that prints information to the specified PrintStream.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • checkGLError

        public void checkGLError()
                  throws OpenGLException
        Checks the current context for OpenGL errors.
        Throws:
        OpenGLException - if GetError returns anything other than NO_ERROR

      • getErrorString

        public static java.lang.String getErrorString(int errorCode)
        Translates an OpenGL error code to a String describing the error.
        Parameters:
        errorCode - the error code, as returned by GetError.
        Returns:
        the error description

      • setupDebugMessageCallback

        public static Closure setupDebugMessageCallback()
        Detects the best debug output functionality to use and creates a callback that prints information to the standard error stream. The callback function is returned as a Closure, that should be released when no longer needed.

      • setupDebugMessageCallback

        public static Closure setupDebugMessageCallback(java.io.PrintStream stream)
        Detects the best debug output functionality to use and creates a callback that prints information to the specified PrintStream. The callback function is returned as a Closure, that should be released when no longer needed.
        Parameters:
        stream - the output PrintStream
